name: TestFlight boarding
description: The easiest way to invite your TestFlight beta testers. The App Name is the name of the Heroku application, not the name of your app.

ITC_APP_ID.description: The App ID or App Identifier (Bundle Identifier) of your app from iTunes Connect, to which the tester will be invited.

FASTLANE_ITC_TEAM_NAME.description: Optional: If you're in multiple teams, enter the name of your iTC team here. Make sure it matches.

ITC_APP_TESTER_GROUPS.description: Optional: The groups you want the invited to be placed in

ITC_TOKEN.description: Optional: Set a password to protect your website from random people signing up.

GA_PROPERTY_ID.description: Optional: Configure Google Analytics to track visitors on your website.

IMPRINT_URL.description: Optional: URL to imprint. The link is shown on the invite page.

env.FASTLANE_SESSION:
